sentences.english: Such had been his first dip into the dark abysses of existence.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次跌进人生黑暗深渊的情形就是这样。

sentences.english: He thought that he already distinctly perceived the brink of the bottomless abyss.
sentences.chinese: 他仿佛已清清楚楚地望见那无底深渊边上的陡壁。

sentences.english: Atlas: I have woken the torment of the underworld, vanished to the darkest pit of Hades .
sentences.chinese: 我唤醒了地狱中的痛苦，在冥王最黑暗的深渊中隐去。

sentences.english: And his cursed soul was cast into the viles of Hades…
sentences.chinese: 他那被诅咒的灵魂坠入了哈迪斯的深渊。

sentences.english: Clearly know is the abyss, I still smiling to see you jump down.
sentences.chinese: 明明知道是万丈深渊，我还是笑着看你往下跳。

sentences.english: Try not to wallow in feelings of guilt.
sentences.chinese: 不要让自己沉浸在愧疚的深渊里。

sentences.english: I lurks in the hearts of an abyss, also dropped boulder payment of voices.
sentences.chinese: 在我的心里潜伏着一个深渊，扔下巨石也发不出声音。

sentences.english: I apologize for my record of minuets to those who cry from the depths.
sentences.chinese: 我为我的小步舞曲唱片向在深渊呐喊的人致歉。

sentences.english: He made his way to the elevators and went down to a storage area on the ground floor, next to the Pits.
sentences.chinese: 他走向升降梯下往底层的储存区，紧靠着深渊。

sentences.english: Two people return cabin, was blown to fall by bizzard however abyss.
sentences.chinese: 两人回到小木屋，却被大风雪吹落下了万丈深渊。

sentences.english: We love each other in the sunless abyss.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱对方在没有阳光的深渊。

sentences.english: The one always look the deep will find the deep looks back.
sentences.chinese: 长期望向深渊的人，会发现深远也望向他。

sentences.english: The world was sliding into the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 当时世界正在滑向大萧条的深渊。

sentences.english: To which of the gulfs did he nod his head?
sentences.chinese: 他向这些深渊中的哪一条点头表示同意？

sentences.english: Now, global climate change negotiations appear headed toward the same aimless end.
sentences.chinese: 今天，全球气候变暖谈判正滑向相似的深渊。

definition: to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
to sink into (vice, depravity etc)/to pass into oblivion/downfall/passing
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
